law.history: Repealed 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 285, sec. 36, effective August 1, 1988. -- Amended 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 70, sec. 5, effective July 1, 1958. -- Amended 1956 (2d Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 9, sec. 5. -- Created 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 191, sec. 5.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Cancellation of licenses -- Voluntary surrender of license certificate -- Notice to cabinet of discontinuation of business -- Accrued taxes -- Surrender of bond.
